title: Revert Cases data-fetching logic to Version 93

requirements.text: Revert the data-fetching logic for surgery cases in the frontend to the implementation from Version 93. This applies to all locations where cases are fetched and supplied to views, including the Dashboard (DashboardView.tsx) and the Cases list page (CasesListView.tsx). The regression introduced in Version 97 caused cases to not appear in either view; the Version 93 approach must be restored so that cases load and render correctly.

quotes: Revert to data-fetching logic from Version 93

acceptanceCriteria: Surgery cases appear correctly on the Dashboard view after login.
Surgery cases appear correctly on the Cases list view after login.
The data-fetching hooks/queries used for cases match the approach from Version 93, not Version 97.
No regression is introduced to other views or features.

constraints: Do not change the backend Motoko actor or any backend data models.
Only revert data-fetching logic â€” do not alter unrelated UI, filtering, sorting, or form components.
nonGoals: Introducing new features or UI changes beyond restoring the Version 93 data-fetching behavior.
Changing backend query endpoints or data schemas.
Modifying immutable frontend paths such as useActor.ts, useInternetIdentity.ts, or main.tsx.
